bibl.title: Homerica Varia Michiganensia. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Consists partially of republications of texts edited in Nancy E. Priest's dissertation: Homeric Papyri in the Michigan Collection" (Ann Arbor, 1975) [cf. EADEM, Michigan Homeric Papyri. I: Iliad A-R, ZPE 46 (1982) pp. 51-94 et pl. II a]. - Section 1. New Homeric Fragments: - I. P. Mich. Inv. 5694d. Iliad 8.457-78, 491-507. Karanis, III A.D.; - II. 1210 + 1216a. Iliad 13.289-301. Provenance unknown, III A.D.; - III. 1217b. Iliad 24.507-513. Provenance unknown, I-II A.D. (?); - IV. 4162b. Iliad 24.681-5, 723-8. Provenance unknown, V/VI A.D. - Section 2. Notes on Published Papyri: - Iliad Papyri from the Michigan Collection (P. Mich. Inv. 6055 [= Priest No. 7]; - 6225 [= P. Mich. Schwendner 4]; - 5576c [= P. Mich. Schwendner 6]; - 6052 [= Priest No. 22]; - 19 + 20a + 20b [ed.: Anthony B. BREEN, A Papyrus of the Iliad from the Michigan Collection (K 192-213, 483-487), ZPE 59 (1985) pp. 29-30 et pl. IIa]; - 919 [= Priest No. 24]; - 6654 [= Priest No. 29]); - The Odyssey Papyri of the Cornell Collection (P. Corn. Inv. MSS. A 101.I [= P. Oxy. III, 448 (= Pack2 1148)]; - Section 3. N.E. Priest's Dissertation: - Iliad Papyri from the Cornell Collection (P. Corn. Inv. MSS. A 101.VI [= P. Oxy. III, 541 (= Pack2 678); Priest No. 8]; - A 101.VII [= P. Oxy. III, 543 (= Pack2 700); Priest No. 11]; - A 101.VIII [= P. Oxy. III, 544 (= Pack2 715); Priest No. 12]; - A 101.IX [= P. Oxy. III, 545 (= Pack2 731); Priest No. 13]; - A 101.X [= P. Oxy. III, 546 (= Pack2 808); Priest No. 18]; - A 101.XI [= P. Oxy. III, 547 (= Pack2 811); Priest No. 19]; - A 101.XII [= P. Oxy. III, 548 (= Pack2 841); Priest No. 21]; - A 101.XIII [= P. Oxy. III, 549 (= Pack2 869); Priest No. 23]; - Odyssey Papyri from the Michigan Collection (P. Mich. Inv. 2764 [= Priest No. 32]; - 3390 [= P. Sel. Warga 1]; - 3692 [= Priest No. 33]; - 5636 [= Priest No. 34]; - 3786 [= Priest No. 35]; - 1202 + 1203 + 1209 [= Priest No. 36]; - 5760d [= Priest, No. 37]; - 37 [= Priest, No. 38]; - 1220 [= Priest No. 39]; - 1589 [= Priest No. 40]. - Pp. 79-81: Appendix I. Edition of P. Mich. Inv. 2931 [descr.: P. Mich. VI, 390, intr.]. Iliad 2.1-42 (with title). II A.D.; - 81-84: Appendix II. Catalogue of all the published Homeric papyri kept in the Papyrology Rooms at the University of Michigan (P. Mich. and P. Corn.); - 84: Afterthought.
bibl.seg: GAGOS Traianos, Nikos LITINAS and Nancy E. PRIEST †, Homerica Varia Michiganensia. Avec résumé en anglais.

Consists partially of republications of texts edited in Nancy E. Priest's dissertation: Homeric Papyri in the Michigan Collection" (Ann Arbor, 1975) [cf. EADEM, Michigan Homeric Papyri. I: Iliad A-R, ZPE 46 (1982) pp. 51-94 et pl. II a]. - Section 1. New Homeric Fragments: - I. P. Mich. Inv. 5694d. Iliad 8.457-78, 491-507. Karanis, III A.D.; - II. 1210 + 1216a. Iliad 13.289-301. Provenance unknown, III A.D.; - III. 1217b. Iliad 24.507-513. Provenance unknown, I-II A.D. (?); - IV. 4162b. Iliad 24.681-5, 723-8. Provenance unknown, V/VI A.D. - Section 2. Notes on Published Papyri: - Iliad Papyri from the Michigan Collection (P. Mich. Inv. 6055 [= Priest No. 7]; - 6225 [= P. Mich. Schwendner 4]; - 5576c [= P. Mich. Schwendner 6]; - 6052 [= Priest No. 22]; - 19 + 20a + 20b [ed.: Anthony B. BREEN, A Papyrus of the Iliad from the Michigan Collection (K 192-213, 483-487), ZPE 59 (1985) pp. 29-30 et pl. IIa]; - 919 [= Priest No. 24]; - 6654 [= Priest No. 29]); - The Odyssey Papyri of the Cornell Collection (P. Corn. Inv. MSS. A 101.I [= P. Oxy. III, 448 (= Pack2 1148)]; - Section 3. N.E. Priest's Dissertation: - Iliad Papyri from the Cornell Collection (P. Corn. Inv. MSS. A 101.VI [= P. Oxy. III, 541 (= Pack2 678); Priest No. 8]; - A 101.VII [= P. Oxy. III, 543 (= Pack2 700); Priest No. 11]; - A 101.VIII [= P. Oxy. III, 544 (= Pack2 715); Priest No. 12]; - A 101.IX [= P. Oxy. III, 545 (= Pack2 731); Priest No. 13]; - A 101.X [= P. Oxy. III, 546 (= Pack2 808); Priest No. 18]; - A 101.XI [= P. Oxy. III, 547 (= Pack2 811); Priest No. 19]; - A 101.XII [= P. Oxy. III, 548 (= Pack2 841); Priest No. 21]; - A 101.XIII [= P. Oxy. III, 549 (= Pack2 869); Priest No. 23]; - Odyssey Papyri from the Michigan Collection (P. Mich. Inv. 2764 [= Priest No. 32]; - 3390 [= P. Sel. Warga 1]; - 3692 [= Priest No. 33]; - 5636 [= Priest No. 34]; - 3786 [= Priest No. 35]; - 1202 + 1203 + 1209 [= Priest No. 36]; - 5760d [= Priest, No. 37]; - 37 [= Priest, No. 38]; - 1220 [= Priest No. 39]; - 1589 [= Priest No. 40]. - Pp. 79-81: Appendix I. Edition of P. Mich. Inv. 2931 [descr.: P. Mich. VI, 390, intr.]. Iliad 2.1-42 (with title). II A.D.; - 81-84: Appendix II. Catalogue of all the published Homeric papyri kept in the Papyrology Rooms at the University of Michigan (P. Mich. and P. Corn.); - 84: Afterthought.
